karunu mese wuwada, brithanya palana samayedi gena ena lada mudubim panatha yatathe, mema dighawapi wiharasthanaya sathu bhumi pramanaya da, godanangili siyallada, brithanyayo owunata nathu kara gathha. 1887 warshayedi madakalapu disapathiwarayawa siti brithanya jathika alansan belige niyoga anuwa alaweli amunu aadiya bandima sandaha dighawapi chaithayayata ayath gal kanu, gadol, sellipi yoda ganuni.

mese chathummaharajikaye patan akanita bambaa thalaya dakwa siyal dew bambaahu da thun kalhi ma budun sarana yana siyalu naga, suparna, yaksha, asura, gandharwa aadi sathwaga da budu pirisata ma ayath wanne ya.
indiyawa, nepalaya, maladiwayina, bangladeshaya, bhuthanaya mema madhyasthanaye samajika ratawal wana athara shri lankawa mema ratawal samanga adala awabodhatha giwisumata elambaimata niyamithayi.
